== Sancoale (CT) (626886) ==

Sancoale (CT) is a town in the [[MORMUGAO 001]] taluka of [[SOUTH GOA]] district with an area of 23.48 sq. km. and harbouring 5035 households with total population of 21923 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[MARGAO]] is at a distance of 28 km. The state headquarter [[PANAJI]] is at a distance of 28 km. Male population is 11657 and female population is 10266. Scheduled Caste population is 114 and Scheduled Tribes population is 597. Census Location Code of the town is 626886<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is BELGAUM at a distance of 180 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is PUNE at a distance of 490 km. Railway station is at DABOLIM at a distance of 3 km.

== Sanitation and Drinking Water ==  
The town has open drainage system.
Water is supplied from a service reservoir. The town gets it water as tap water from a treated source. The capacity of the water supply system is 600 kilo-litres.

The nearest fire fighting service is at VERNA CT (8 km) .
